01.title: Planted with Purpose
01.scripture: Jeremiah 17:8 – 'They will be like a tree planted by the water... its leaves are always green.'
01.devotion: You weren’t randomly placed—you were planted with purpose. Your roots matter. Stay connected to the Source. What God plants, He provides for and protects.
01.prayer: Lord, keep me rooted in You no matter where I’m planted.

02.title: Steady in the Storm
02.scripture: Matthew 7:24 – 'Everyone who hears these words of mine and puts them into practice is like a wise man who built his house on the rock.'
02.devotion: Storms test your foundation. Rooted people don’t panic when the winds blow—they stand on the Rock. Don’t just hear God’s Word—live it. That’s how you weather any storm.
02.prayer: Jesus, anchor me in truth that doesn’t shake when life does.

03.title: Grow Down to Grow Up
03.scripture: Colossians 2:7 – 'Let your roots grow down into him... then your faith will grow strong.'
03.devotion: Strong roots come before strong branches. The deeper your faith digs, the higher your life can grow. Don’t be afraid to go deep—God honors hidden growth.
03.prayer: Father, deepen my faith so my life can reflect Your strength.

04.title: Fruitful in Every Season
04.scripture: Psalm 1:3 – '...like a tree planted by streams of water, which yields its fruit in season...'
04.devotion: There’s no wasted season when you’re rooted in God. Even in waiting, He’s working. Fruit comes in due time. Stay planted and trust His timing.
04.prayer: God, make me fruitful even in the silent seasons.

05.title: God of the Roots
05.scripture: Isaiah 37:31 – 'Once more a remnant of the kingdom... will take root below and bear fruit above.'
05.devotion: Before fruit, there must be roots. God sees what’s underground. Your private surrender shapes your public witness. Keep going—He honors what's done in the dark.
05.prayer: Lord, build me in the hidden places so I can honor You in the open.
